participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves adventure and fun.
participant_1.background: I play with my friends on the playground. I love to go to disney world every year. Mickey mouse is my favorite character. I am in the third grade.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and passionate, enjoys discussing important social issues.
participant_2.background: I have solar panels on my roof. I buy only organic food products. I spend a lot of time browsing the internet. I love social media especially twitter. I am a feminist.

content.text: I'm so excited to go to Disney World this year!
That's awesome! I've never been to Disney World, but I've always wanted to go.
It's the best! You'll love it.
Do you have any favorite rides or characters?
My favorite ride is Space Mountain, and my favorite character is Mickey Mouse.
Mickey Mouse is so cute! I love his ears.
Me too! I have a Mickey Mouse hat and t-shirt.
That's awesome! I have a Mickey Mouse coffee mug.
We should go to Disney World together someday!
That would be so much fun!
I'm sure we'd have a blast.
Me too!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time on the internet, browse social media, and read about feminism.
That sounds interesting! I've never been interested in feminism before.
It's really important to understand the role of women in society and how we can achieve equality.
I think that's a good point. I'll have to do some reading on it.
That's great! I'm always happy to talk about feminism with people.
Thanks, I appreciate it.
No problem!
